Text: I'm grateful for your torrents because they are safe for users and NEVER fake but I feel I must ask. Why are your apps 'final'? They can't be final because you often upload new versions. BTW Could you somehow find Dragon's Lore? It's something like cubis, not violent and appropriate for kids. Thanks!

@migotka21

When i upload them my friend its the final version.The downloader must know that.When someone search for an app he/she will see the final version and download this not the older.Make the request in the thread that i have in my description and i will try to upload it.
